title: Survive at Midnight
description: Death doesn't always bring peace. With memories of her dead family and friends haunting her, Luna Ketz tries to untangle her life from the hold Chance has had on her over the past four years, but it's harder than she thought. In death his secrets are revealed, plunging Luna into the mind of the man who ruined her life. Thoughts of her soon-to-be-born baby only bring to mind its monstrous father.Haunted by a new set of dreams, Luna fears her baby will grow up to be a carbon copy of him. Battling to keep hold of her sanity, she slowly loses a grip on the world around her. The dead begin to speak, and she can't possibly ignore them. With Chance whispering evil deeds in her ear, she treads a trail she never thought she would venture and must rely on her worst enemy to help her conquer her biggest trial yet--herself.*Warning: This book contains content that may be disturbing to some.*
author: Kayla Krantz
